sourcesContent:
<template>
  <a-modal
    :title="title"
    :width="800"
    :visible="visible"
    :confirmLoading="confirmLoading"
    @ok="handleOk"
    @cancel="handleCancel"
    cancelText="关闭">
    
    <a-spin :spinning="confirmLoading">
      <a-form :form="form">
      
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="发文ID">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入发文ID" v-decorator="['iid', validatorRules.iid ]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="标题">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入标题" v-decorator="['stitle', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="标题传入参数">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入标题传入参数" v-decorator="['stitleparam', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="标题部门（根据模板中定义的稿纸头级别获取对应的及部门）">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入标题部门（根据模板中定义的稿纸头级别获取对应的及部门）" v-decorator="['stitledept', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="密级 1 普通、2 秘密、3 机密、4 决密">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入密级 1 普通、2 秘密、3 机密、4 决密" v-decorator="['ssafetylevel', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="拟稿人">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入拟稿人" v-decorator="['iuserid', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="拟稿人名称">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入拟稿人名称" v-decorator="['susername', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="拟稿人所在部门">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入拟稿人所在部门" v-decorator="['ideptid', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="拟稿人所在部门名称">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入拟稿人所在部门名称" v-decorator="['sdeptname', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="电话">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入电话" v-decorator="['sphone', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="拟稿日期">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入拟稿日期" v-decorator="['tdraftdate', validatorRules.tdraftdate ]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="有无附件标示 1 是 0 否">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入有无附件标示 1 是 0 否" v-decorator="['sfilemark', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="主题词">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入主题词" v-decorator="['skeyword', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="发文编号">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入发文编号" v-decorator="['snumber', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="校对">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入校对" v-decorator="['scollate', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="打字">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入打字" v-decorator="['stypewrite', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="打印份数">
          <a-input-number v-decorator="[ 'iprintnum', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="封发">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入封发" v-decorator="['tsealldate', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="是否有背景材料 1是 0 否">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入是否有背景材料 1是 0 否" v-decorator="['sbackgroup', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="全行发布 1 是 0 否">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入全行发布 1 是 0 否" v-decorator="['sovert', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="是否会签 1 是 0 否">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入是否会签 1 是 0 否" v-decorator="['scountersign', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="会签部门IDS(以逗号分隔)">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入会签部门IDS(以逗号分隔)" v-decorator="['scrsdeptids', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="会签部门">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入会签部门" v-decorator="['scrsdept', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="排版标识 1是 0否 默认否 排版后自动更改为 是 ">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入排版标识 1是 0否 默认否 排版后自动更改为 是 " v-decorator="['ssettype', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="主送单位">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入主送单位" v-decorator="['smainunitids', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="主送单位名称">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入主送单位名称" v-decorator="['smainunitnames', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="抄送单位">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入抄送单位" v-decorator="['sccunitids', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="抄送单位名称">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入抄送单位名称" v-decorator="['sccunitnames', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="内部发送">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入内部发送" v-decorator="['sinsideids', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="内部部门名称">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入内部部门名称" v-decorator="['sinsidedeptname', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="sreportids">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入sreportids" v-decorator="['sreportids', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="sreportnames">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入sreportnames" v-decorator="['sreportnames', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="缓急 1 一般 2 急件 3 特急">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入缓急 1 一般 2 急件 3 特急" v-decorator="['surgency', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="政务公开 1 是 0 否">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入政务公开 1 是 0 否" v-decorator="['saffairsovert', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="不公开理由">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入不公开理由" v-decorator="['saccount', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="签发时间">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入签发时间" v-decorator="['tissuedate', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="修改时间">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入修改时间" v-decorator="['tupdate', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="稿纸头名称（取值于模板 <稿纸头名称>）">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入稿纸头名称（取值于模板 <稿纸头名称>）" v-decorator="['spapername', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="文件类型 1 发文、2 签报、">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入文件类型 1 发文、2 签报、" v-decorator="['sfiletype', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="状态 1 办结 0 未办结">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入状态 1 办结 0 未办结" v-decorator="['sstate', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="备注">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入备注" v-decorator="['sremarks', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="itimelimit">
          <a-input-number v-decorator="[ 'itimelimit', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="ipaginalnum">
          <a-input-number v-decorator="[ 'ipaginalnum', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="sreason">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入sreason" v-decorator="['sreason', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="冗余">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入冗余" v-decorator="['sredundance', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="冗余1">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入冗余1" v-decorator="['sredundance1', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="processinstid">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入processinstid" v-decorator="['processinstid', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="所选文号ID">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入所选文号ID" v-decorator="['idocid', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="itemplateid">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入itemplateid" v-decorator="['itemplateid', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="签发人">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入签发人" v-decorator="['sissueuser', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="签发日期 格式：2016-03-11">
          <a-date-picker v-decorator="[ 'dissuedate', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="中文签发日期（格式：二○一六年三月二十一号）">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入中文签发日期（格式：二○一六年三月二十一号）" v-decorator="['dzhcnissuedate', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="规范性标志 1 是 0 否">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入规范性标志 1 是 0 否" v-decorator="['sstandardflag', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="发送地市中支Ids">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入发送地市中支Ids" v-decorator="['sprovissuedcityids', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
		
      </a-form>
    </a-spin>
  </a-modal>
</template>

<script>
  import { httpAction } from '@/api/manage'
  import pick from 'lodash.pick'
  import moment from "moment"

  export default {
    name: "DisFileTestModal",
    data () {
      return {
        title:"操作",
        visible: false,
        model: {},
        labelCol: {
          xs: { span: 24 },
          sm: { span: 5 },
        },
        wrapperCol: {
          xs: { span: 24 },
          sm: { span: 16 },
        },

        confirmLoading: false,
        form: this.$form.createForm(this),
        validatorRules:{
        iid:{rules: [{ required: true, message: '请输入发文ID!' }]},
        tdraftdate:{rules: [{ required: true, message: '请输入拟稿日期!' }]},
        },
        url: {
          add: "/oaDisFileTest/disFileTest/add",
          edit: "/oaDisFileTest/disFileTest/edit",
        },
      }
    },
    created () {
    },
    methods: {
      add () {
        this.edit({});
      },
      edit (record) {
        this.form.resetFields();
        this.model = Object.assign({}, record);
        this.visible = true;
        this.$nextTick(() => {
          this.form.setFieldsValue(pick(this.model,'iid','stitle','stitleparam','stitledept','ssafetylevel','iuserid','susername','ideptid','sdeptname','sphone','tdraftdate','sfilemark','skeyword','snumber','scollate','stypewrite','iprintnum','tsealldate','sbackgroup','sovert','scountersign','scrsdeptids','scrsdept','ssettype','smainunitids','smainunitnames','sccunitids','sccunitnames','sinsideids','sinsidedeptname','sreportids','sreportnames','surgency','saffairsovert','saccount','tissuedate','tupdate','spapername','sfiletype','sstate','sremarks','itimelimit','ipaginalnum','sreason','sredundance','sredundance1','processinstid','idocid','itemplateid','sissueuser','dzhcnissuedate','sstandardflag','sprovissuedcityids'))
		  //时间格式化
          this.form.setFieldsValue({dissuedate:this.model.dissuedate?moment(this.model.dissuedate):null})
        });

      },
      close () {
        this.$emit('close');
        this.visible = false;
      },
      handleOk () {
        const that = this;
        // 触发表单验证
        this.form.validateFields((err, values) => {
          if (!err) {
            that.confirmLoading = true;
            let httpurl = '';
            let method = '';
            if(!this.model.id){
              httpurl+=this.url.add;
              method = 'post';
            }else{
              httpurl+=this.url.edit;
               method = 'put';
            }
            let formData = Object.assign(this.model, values);
            //时间格式化
            formData.dissuedate = formData.dissuedate?formData.dissuedate.format():null;
            
            console.log(formData)
            httpAction(httpurl,formData,method).then((res)=>{
              if(res.success){
                that.$message.success(res.message);
                that.$emit('ok');
              }else{
                that.$message.warning(res.message);
              }
            }).finally(() => {
              that.confirmLoading = false;
              that.close();
            })



          }
        })
      },
      handleCancel () {
        this.close()
      },


    }
  }
</script>

<style lang="less" scoped>

</style>
